name: Millionaire Show
description:
※ WARNING : This game contains scenes of severe gore. ※
‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥
How are your reflexes and concentration?
Calm down, and fix your palpitation and eyesight.
You need to calm down. Do not rush.
You will see an answer if you are patient.

Compare your records with users from all around the world.
Your reflexes can become the best in the world.

You simply need to move one finger.
This game is simple and addictive, and it helps with improving your concentration.
This is the best game for killing time. You can’t stop playing this game!

I hope all of you become a millionaire!!!


■■ SYNOPSIS ■■

A show that the whole world enjoys, where a dream of becoming a millionaire comes true, is hosted every year.
In order to become a millionaire, they must play a game with danger.
If they win the game, they get to turn their lives around in a second.
Many people participate in the show. They either become a millionaire or are disabled for life.
You, living a normal life, decide to participate in this millionaire show to have a chance at turning your life around.
Will you be able to become a millionaire?
The show begins from now!

SHOW~ TIME !!!


■■ FEATURES ■■

+ Various game item
+ Free item slot machine that is issued infinitely!
+ Game Center Leader boards
+ Submit Facebook, Twitter
